org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1
Class HQApi

java.lang.Object
  org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1.HQApi

public class HQApi
extends java.lang.Object

The Hyperic HQ API. This is the main entry point into the HQ Api.

Constructor Detail

HQApi

public HQApi(java.lang.String host,
             int port,
             boolean isSecure,
             java.lang.String user,
             java.lang.String password)
Parameters:
host - The hostname of the HQ Server to connect to.
port - The port on the HQ server to connect to.
isSecure - Set to true if connecting via SSL.
user - The user to connect as.
password - The password for the given user.

HQApi

public HQApi(java.net.URI uri,
             java.lang.String user,
             java.lang.String password)
Parameters:
uri - The URI of the HQ Server to connect to.
user - The user to connect as.
password - The password for the given user.
